description: Maximal power of 2 arising when A000005 is applied repeatedly to n!.
comments: Unlike the iteration of EulerPhi(A000005) or Cototient(A051953) functions, here the emerging powers of 2 are not accumulated at the terminal phase of iteration sequence. Non-2-powers can be intercalated.
author: _Labos Elemer_, Feb 24 2000
